Facilities

More Than a Clinic.
Designed for Real Recovery

Every part of our center is intentionally built to support healing

01

Group Therapy & Clinical Spaces

Purposefully designed for therapeutic engagement, emotional safety, and focused healing

  • Trauma-informed sessions
  • modalities
  • Private 1-on-1 counseling pods
  • Mindfulness
  • stress reduction work
Accepted insurance:
02

Community & Recovery Lounge

Shared spaces that nurture connection and accountability between clients — even outside formal sessions.

  • Process groups
  • peer-led support
  • expressive therapy
  • Family engagement zones
  • Comfortable relaxation areas
Accepted insurance:
03

Wellness & Nutrition Support Areas

Healing begins with the body. Our wellness areas help clients build healthy, sustainable habits in recovery.

  • Nutritional counseling
  • Holistic wellness education
  • Stress management techniques
  • Group mealtime

Steps

Starting Your Recovery
Is Easier Than You Think

More than just treatment — we create a path to real, lasting recovery with flexibility, compassion, and clinical excellence

  • 01

    Reach Out

    We’ll listen, answer your questions, and explain your options — no pressure, just clarity.

  • 02

    Verify Your Insurance

    Submit your info online or over the phone. We’ll handle the paperwork and confirm what’s covered in minutes.

  • 03

    Get Your Personalized Treatment Plan

    Meet with a clinical specialist to create a plan that fits your goals, schedule, and diagnosis — no one-size-fits-all approach.

  • 04

    Start Your Program Within Days

    Most clients begin treatment within 24–72 hours. You’ll be supported every step of the way, from day one.

We've Got You Covered
